abstract: Wal-Mart says sales at American stores open at least a year increased during last three months, reversing negative trend that began in 2009.
snippet: The company’s return to previously successful practices brings a same-store boost ahead of third-quarter earnings.
lead_paragraph: The company’s return to previously successful practices brings a same-store boost ahead of third-quarter earnings.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Sales Improve at Its Stores in the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Sales Improve At Its Stores in the U.S.
headline.seo: Wal-Mart Reports a Sales Increase in U.S. Stores
